features: $19.95 per month - All features included. Accurate, Discreet, Real-Time GPS Tracker. Track your vehicle, machinery, valuables.
Magnet Case is not included in this listing.
Cancel Anytime - No Contract - No Hidden Fees.

body.description: Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker Unlimited Tracking Possibilities The Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker enables you to keep an eye on the people and possessions that mean the most to you. - Watch the route of a loved one’s vehicle to make sure they safely arrive at their destination. - Ensure where your company car is, even if you are miles and miles away. - Have peace of mind and confidence that you will be able to quickly locate an expensive stolen asset. Smartphone, Tablet & Desktop Views No matter your preference, you can track your vehicle from any Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop. We make all of our features super simple and straight forward to use. If you ever need technical help, you have a direct line to our professional in-house customer support team 7 days a week. Consistent updates – We keep it simple This GPS Tracker will work in the USA and Canada. The default settings is set for the tracker to report every 1 minute, but customers can change that setting free of charge to reporting every 10 seconds, 30 seconds, 2 minutes, 3 minutes, or 10 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Low Cost Subscription plan! This tracker has a very low subscription plan! Don't get stuck into long term contracts with high fees offered by others. With us, you will have no contract, no activation fees, no cancellation fees, no hidden fees, and affordable subscription plan options as low as only $15.95 per month! Unlimited Tracking Possibilities The Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker enables you to keep an eye on the people and possessions that mean the most to you. - Watch the route of a loved one’s vehicle to make sure they safely arrive at their destination. - Ensure where your company car is, even if you are miles and miles away. - Have peace of mind and confidence that you will be able to quickly locate an expensive stolen asset. Peace of Mind The Optimus Smartphone App gives you real-time reporting at your fingertips. We take pride in providing our customers with instant reporting so there is no waiting or delays on our tracking App. We use 4G LTE signal to ensure that you have the most accurate and reliable tracking available on the market. Long Lasting Battery The tracker battery life is expected to last up to 1 Month when reporting frequency is set to 1 minute. If the reporting frequency is lowered, the battery will not last as long. If the reporting frequency is raised, the battery life will last longer. The tracker will send you a low battery alert giving you plenty of time to retrieve the tracker and charge it back to 100%.

Small and Powerful 1 Month Battery Life The tracker battery life is expected to last up to 1 month when reporting frequency is set to 1 minute. If the reporting frequency is lowered, the battery will not last as long. If the reporting frequency is raised, the battery life will last longer. The tracker will send you a low battery alert giving you plenty of time to retrieve the tracker and charge it back to 100%. Small and Powerful This tracker may be small in size, but it has more power than meets the eye. It will detect movement, speed, direction, location, and more all in real-time. It is only 3.11 x 1.5 x 1.75 inches so you will be able to hide it or travel with it conveniently and confidently. Position Report Frequency Customizable frequency reports at your disposal. You have the control to change how often your GPS tracker reports at any time. The less frequent reporting will allow your tracker’s battery to last longer while the more frequent reporting will make the trail more detailed. We recommend keeping your tracker at the default setting of 1 minute reporting frequency for long battery life combined with a detailed track. You can set the frequency to 10 or 30 second reporting at no extra charge. Backpacks and Luggage Place your tracker inside a backpack of a loved one, your luggage, or your laptop bag. You can fit this tracker almost anywhere and have the confidence and peace of mind that you will be able to locate your loved one or important possessions at any moment from the tip of your fingers.

Reliable and Accurate Instant Alerts Enjoy the peace of mind that you will be notified when an event occurs. Our App and website will allow you to get Push Notifications, Text Messages and/or Emails. Powerful App You will love our App. It is simple and reliable. Our GPS Tracking App is super easy to use. It is straight forward and no nonsense. We include all of the features in our low-cost monthly subscription. There are no confusing add-ons or levels to choose from. Customize your alerts and notifications Create Alerts, Geofences (when the tracker leaves or enters a pre-defined area) and Driving Reports all from within the App itself. Available for IPhone and Android Phones. Speed Alerts When your tracker is on the road, our software collects data with real-time speed limit tracking. You can set alerts to notify you when and where the tracker went over the speed limit and at what speed. Driving history reports will show a record of the trip and how often the tracker went over the speed limit or a pre-defined maximum speed you set for the tracker. Geofence Alerts A Geofence is used when the tracker leaves or enters a pre-defined area Set your customized areas on a map to know when the vehicle enters or leaves that pre-defined area. Our Geofence mapping uses state-of-the-art technology so you can draw any shape on the map to get pinpoint accuracy on your Geofence alerts. We use the most advanced and reliable Google Maps for our App and web browser.

Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker Unlimited Tracking Possibilities The Optimus 3.0 GPS Tracker enables you to keep an eye on the people and possessions that mean the most to you. - Watch the route of a loved one’s vehicle to make sure they safely arrive at their destination. - Ensure where your company car is, even if you are miles and miles away. - Have peace of mind and confidence that you will be able to quickly locate an expensive stolen asset. Smartphone, Tablet & Desktop Views No matter your preference, you can track your vehicle from any Smartphone, Tablet or Desktop. We make all of our features super simple and straight forward to use. If you ever need technical help, you have a direct line to our professional in-house customer support team 7 days a week. Consistent updates – We keep it simple This GPS Tracker will work in the USA and Canada. The default settings is set for the tracker to report every 1 minute, but customers can change that setting free of charge to reporting every 10 seconds, 30 seconds, 2 minutes, 3 minutes, or 10 minutes. Asset Protection Real-Time Tracking on App and Website. Get Notifications on your Cellphone, SMS, Email. Coverage Limited to the USA and Canada.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to have. 95% pinpoint accuracy.
reviews.reviewText: This product is great and very affordable even with the monthly subscription and payment. Was able to locate and catch everything that I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had other gps trackers in the past. This one is so easy to get up and running and works really well. So far So Good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It worked well for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Started off tracking well but eventually the routes were broken, false starts and gaps in travel. I was still able to find out where she was cheating with...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not very accurate but for moving it does the job. Very long battery life. Once subscription ends the device no longer works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works fantastic in Houston TEXAS
reviews.reviewText: Spoke with tech support prior to purchasing. They were GREAT.Product works fantastic. If you understand that GPS satellites move and are not PIN POINT accurate, then you understand why the device appears to "move in and around your neighbors house while your car sits in your driveway. It is Accurate within what seems to be less than 50 yards.I love it and plan on buying a second for our send car.The cost of this device is cheaper than paying for today's higher interest rates after your truck is stolen.Don't be cheap, buy a solid product. This is one of those Products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: I was happy with the 2.0. But I’m very glad I upgraded. I’ve been using it three weeks and I still have over 50% of battery left.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: I dislike paid for reviews. This product is no where the the 5 star reviews listed on Amazon. I purchased this tracker to have peace of mind while my daughter is driving. This tracker is a failure all around. It does not give consistent alerts, the location and speed of vehicle is reported incorrectly. This product is definitely a waste of money and the seller should stop paying for reviews. I would recommend if your looking for a tracker to stay clear of Optimus 3.0 tracker. I will be returning it immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, great notifications.
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to connect. Has a couple of notification options that worked well for what I needed. It's small so you have lots of places you could place it in your vehicle. It kept me updated with notifications or while using the app it shoes you movement and speed. The only thing I had trouble with was my "monthly" subscription would stop so I had to re register it every month or pay the yearly option
